snippet: Seven of the music historian and critic Peter Guralnick’s books are being reissued in “enhanced e-book” editions that include video, audio and new chapters.
abstract: Seven of music historian and critic Peter Guralnick’s books are being reissued in 'enhanced e-book' editions that include video, audio and new chapters; Guralnick is known for his groundbreaking writing on blues, country and soul music, as well as biographies of pop music figures like Elvis Presley and Sam Cooke.
lead_paragraph: Seven of the music historian and critic Peter Guralnick’s books are being reissued in “enhanced e-book” editions that include video, audio and new chapters.
